attributes.action: make travelling by public transport (buses, DLR, overground and underground trains) in London free for all university students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I can find no reason why under 16s, who do not have any financial responsibilities, have been granted free travel on london buses when university students such as myself receive so little help financially -  apart from that given by the student loans company who's sole aim seems to be to drag us down into serious debt - and really could do without having to pay to get to our places of study.
